item.title: Objectgroup.org Newsletter
item.description: I added a new objectgroup.org newsletter so you can keep up to date with objectgroup all the time here it is and the privacy and conditions are the same as those for all mailchimp mailing lists.

item.title: One Way Ticket
item.description: Here is a cover and interior page I designed for the late poet Paul Fisher.

item.title: Christmas Cards
item.description: This is my Christmas Card design, hand painted with blackberry ink on watercolour paper and four pounds for a pack of five, with square envelopes.

item.title: Edgewords
item.description: The Edge Cafe in Cambridge UK is run to support people in recovery from addiction. This is a poetry collection put together with one hundred percent of the purchase price going to support the cause. I designed the cover and five interior pictures to accompany the poems.

item.title: New Horizons for Paino
item.description: I designed the cover of this music anthology edited by CJ Hazel.
